title: Cyrus Darian and the Ghastly Horde
description: Cyrus Darian is back!And this time he's got an army of ghosts with him - whether he likes it or not.Share our favourite anti-hero's exciting adventures as he struggles to rid himself these adoring followers from the netherworld armed only with Steampunk technology and a tiny dose of the occult.
author: Raven Dane
